title: Leaver Buster problems
body: I was playing a norma game today and I had to eat dinner :( sorry about that, so i got the leaver buster thingy where you get put into low priority queues (this is second time in low priority). So it takes 10 minutes waiting time to go into queue but whenever it reaches 0 the 10 minute clock starts again, so i have to wait another 10 minutes. I kept waiting but, it doesn't stop i even tried logging out and logging in :/ anyone helpful help please :)

replies.body: This is a known bug with Leavebuster, which does not have a hotfix.
